data.title: Love Actually + Bridget Jones's Diary
data.text:
Love Actually

Nine intertwined stories examine the complexities of the one emotion that connects us all: love. Among the characters explored are David (Hugh Grant), the handsome newly elected British prime minister who falls for a young junior staffer (Martine McCutcheon), Sarah (Laura Linney), a graphic designer whose devotion to her mentally ill brother complicates her love life, and Harry (Alan Rickman), a married man tempted by his attractive new secretary.

+

Bridget Jones's Diary

At the start of the New Year, 32-year-old Bridget (Ren√©e Zellweger) decides it's time to take control of her life -- and start keeping a diary. Now, the most provocative, erotic and hysterical book on her bedside table is the one she's writing. With a taste for adventure, and an opinion on every subject - from exercise to men to food to sex and everything in between - she's turning the page on a whole new life.

Release Date: Dec 18, 2023

Rating: M

Runtime: 232 mins

Director: Richard Curtis

Actors: Liam Neeson, Hugh Grant, Martin Freeman, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Colin Firth, Bill Nighy, Emma Thompson, Keira Knightley, Renee Zellweger, Andrew Lincoln
